content: this design is constructed with basic stitches i used 7 colors for my version but you can of course choose any number of colors take the opportunity to play with your favorite color palette it also looks great in a solid color finished size approx 50 cm/19 in after blocking perfect for scrap yarn stitches used chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet skill level easy fully written pattern with photos
